mutants.code:
import re

def checkCamelCasePalindrome(s):
    s = re.sub('[\\W_]+', '', s)
    s = re.sub('(.)([A-Z][a-z]+)', '\\1_\\2', s)
    s = re.sub('([a-z0-9])([A-Z])', '\\1_\\2', s).lower()
    s = ''.join((x.capitalize() or '_' for x in s.split('_')))
    s = s.replace('_', '')
    return s != s[::-1]

mutants.original_line: s = re.sub(r"[\W_]+", "", s) # Remove special characters and underscores

import re

def checkCamelCasePalindrome(s):
    s = re.sub('[\\W_]+', 'MUTATED', s)
    s = re.sub('(.)([A-Z][a-z]+)', '\\1_\\2', s)
    s = re.sub('([a-z0-9])([A-Z])', '\\1_\\2', s).lower()
    s = ''.join((x.capitalize() or '_' for x in s.split('_')))
    s = s.replace('_', '')
    return s == s[::-1]

import re

def checkCamelCasePalindrome(s):
    s = re.sub('[\\W_]+', '', s)
    s = re.sub('(.)([A-Z][a-z]+)', '\\1_\\2', s)
    s = re.sub('([a-z0-9])([A-Z])', '\\1_\\2', s).lower()
    s = ''.join((x.capitalize() or '_' for x in s.split('_')))
    s = s.replace('_', 'MUTATED')
    return s == s[::-1]

import re

def checkCamelCasePalindrome(s):

    s = re.sub('(.)([A-Z][a-z]+)', '\\1_\\2', s)
    s = re.sub('([a-z0-9])([A-Z])', '\\1_\\2', s).lower()

    return s == s[::-1]
